test.name: TEST-DEF-01210
test.description: Test if the execution of an invalid opcode instruction in supervisor mode is captured by the LEON and handled by the HM, and the associated HM action is called. The invalid opcode can be created (for example) by jumping to the address of a fixed string. Check that the remaining partitions are not affected.

teststep.description: Execute a regular operation (e.g. increment a variable). Wait for next MFT.
Execute a unimp instruction. Verify the HM event was raised and the partition continues executing.
Execute a regular operation (e.g. increment a variable). Terminate Test.
